data.message: I am membership admin on a page last night i was blocked from messaging people i was trying to contact for membership i even just tried to message you and it keeps saying "action blocked" can this block be removed?

replies.message: Sorry the page is Snapping Turtle Fanatics..

Hi Bob. It's possible that your account was blocked due to member feedback our team received. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. -Jessica
Facebook ok thank you..I said something like i was going to fast..but on ill wait it out..
I been blocked before also an think facebook nees to know who they are blocking. If no complaints are received, you shouldn't be blocking people in my opinion.!
